root.name: My Hero: Firefighter
root.description: OverviewMy Hero: Firefighter is a game mainly focused around the use of the stylus for the Nintendo DS. The player uses the stylus to shoot a hose, to swing axes, save kittens, save people, use a gas mask, use a ladder, and overall do tasks that a firefighter would do. The game features 13 missions that all feature different and unique objectives centered around being a rookie firefighter. The game also features a ranking system that allows you to earn unlockables.
